description: Grants permission to create a new foundation model agreement.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The CreateFoundationModelAgreement API call allows users to create or modify agreements, which can be used to manipulate account permissions. Attackers can create agreements with elevated privileges or modify existing ones to gain unauthorized access or escalate privileges.

incidents.description: Detecting AI resource-hijacking with Composite Alerts
When AI Gets Hijacked: Exploiting Hosted Models for Dark Roleplaying

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateFoundationModelAgreement to prepare for using foundation models for resource hijacking.
